page.title: 01SUMMARY OF BLOCK
page.content: The main ground cover of this area is {arable}farmland.This is because the main industry is farming.There are four residential areas which include{ part of Cupar,part of Craigrothie,part of Cuparmuir and part of Ceres,a village of a population of 970.Ceres is much larger than Craigrothie and Cuparmuir but Cupar is much larger than Ceres. A large area of this part of Fife is owned by{The National Trust {For Scotland. The NTS property {includes various historical buildings, {the site of a battle held in 1559,Iron {Age forts and 3 doocots. The communications are a railway, 1{major}road,several{minor}roads,The River Eden and various bus services. Industries are{construction,abattoir {and agriculture.}Sports facilities are Riding,Golf and Fishing.
